titles.title: "Kouryakubon" wo Kushi Suru Saikyou no Mahoutsukai: "Meirei Sasero" to wa Iwasenai Oreryuu Maou Toubatsu Saizen Route
The Strongest Sorcerer Who Makes Full Use of the "Strategy Guide"
「攻略本」を駆使する最強の魔法使い ～＜命令させろ＞とは言わせない俺流魔王討伐最善ルート～
The Strongest Wizard Making Full Use of the Strategy Guide: No Taking Orders, I'll Slay the Demon King My Own Way

title: "Kouryakubon" wo Kushi Suru Saikyou no Mahoutsukai: "Meirei Sasero" to wa Iwasenai Oreryuu Maou Toubatsu Saizen Route
title_english: The Strongest Wizard Making Full Use of the Strategy Guide: No Taking Orders, I'll Slay the Demon King My Own Way
title_japanese: 「攻略本」を駆使する最強の魔法使い ～＜命令させろ＞とは言わせない俺流魔王討伐最善ルート～
title_synonyms: The Strongest Sorcerer Who Makes Full Use of the "Strategy Guide"
synopsis:
Magnus is a mage who always got yelled at by the Hero because he was deemed "useless." One day after getting fed up with his party he left, and upon leaving he met a merchant that sold him a mysterious book. 

It turned out that the book which was written in the god's language was actually an ultimate encyclopedia that had a lot of useful information on how to defeat the Demon Lord!

Thanks to that book, he was able to know about boss monsters' weaknesses and raise his level more efficiently, data about important people, and it even had info on complete gourmet spots in any city! Moreover, by using his wits and scheming mind, he's even able to outclass the hero party! With the ultimate encyclopedia in his hands, he advances to the true route to defeat the Demon Lord!

(Source: Mangasushi, edited)
background: "Kouryakubon" wo Kushi Suru Saikyou no Mahoutsukai: "Meirei Sasero" to wa Iwasenai Oreryuu Maou Toubatsu Saizen Route has been published digitally in English as The Strongest Wizard Making Full Use of the Strategy Guide: No Taking Orders, I'll Slay the Demon King My Own Way by Square Enix through Manga UP! and through Comikey since November 27, 2023.
